channel.title: A source for my offline server // A few help Questions
channel.description:
I needs to be easy editable, compitable with Moparscape 3,2 w/ Aryan.
If someone can help me with making a few things.. Sara statue for atk exp.. Zammy statue for str exp.. Guthix statue for def.. All statue's give some HP exp.
I got the start coords already. ^^
Can someone advise me? 8D

item.title: A source for my offline server // A few help Questions
item.dc:creator: @Steen Steen
item.description:
@Steen wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:4, topic:100488”]Thats silly. Why not just connect to someone else’s server? Or make a friend, and get them to host a server and make you admin?

Hosting a 1 player server is silly[/quote]

Ok. I have a friend left of me that want it.
But with source i must use…?

Read full topic
item.source: A source for my offline server // A few help Questions

item.title: A source for my offline server // A few help Questions
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Thats silly. Why not just connect to someone else’s server? Or make a friend, and get them to host a server and make you admin?

Hosting a 1 player server is silly

item.title: A source for my offline server // A few help Questions
item.dc:creator: @Steen Steen
item.description:
@Steen wrote:

Budda:

Why do you want an offline server? This means it can only be played by one person. Thats silly, you’re a silly person.

Ye, i want.
My dad and mom don’t want to make the pc a server. So i make just an 127.0.0.1 server.
Help?

Read full topic
